 Double restricted universal quantification.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-1995.)
statement:
r2al $p |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ph <-> A. x A. y ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> ph ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d x y $.
